caption.title: Number and duration of stockouts of HIV commodities in public health facilities, Kinshasa 2015.
caption.p: TDF-3TC-EFV: Tenofovir/Lamivudine/Efavirenz 300/300/600 mg tablets, 30 tablets. AZT-3TC-NVP: Zidovudine/Lamivudine/Nevirapine 300/150/200 mg tablets, 60 tablets. TDF-3TC: Tenofovir/Lamivudine 300/300 mg tablets, 30 tablets. CTX: Sulfamethoxazole/Trimethoprim 400/80 mg, tablets. HIV test: Determine TM HIV-1/2 Test Kits.
